sqlMap.select:
/* MEETINGROOM.getMeetingroomList */
SELECT , CASE PUBLISH WHEN 0 THEN '비노출' ELSE '노출' END PUBLISH_NAME FROM MEETINGROOM_INFO WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY MEETINGROOM_KEY

/* MEETINGROOM.getMeetingInfo */
SELECT , CASE PUBLISH WHEN 0 THEN '비노출' ELSE '노출' END PUBLISH_NAME FROM MEETINGROOM_INFO WHERE MEETINGROOM_KEY = #meetingroom_key#
sqlMap.update:
/* MEETINGROOM.updateMeetingroomInfo */
UPDATE MEETINGROOM_INFO SET NAME = #name# , TYPE = #type# , SIZE = #size# , MAX_CAPACITY = #max_capacity# , FACILITY = #facility# , HOURLY_PRICE = #hourly_price# , PUBLISH = #publish# , MOD_DATE = NOW() , MOD_ID = #mod_id# WHERE MEETINGROOM_KEY = #meetingroom_key#

/* MEETINGROOM.updateFileCount */
UPDATE MEETINGROOM_INFO SET ATTACH_CNT = ( SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM MEETINGROOM_FILE WHERE MEETINGROOM_KEY = #meetingroom_key# AND STATUS = 'Y') WHERE MEETINGROOM_KEY = #meetingroom_key#

/* MEETINGROOM.deleteMeetingroomInfo */
UPDATE MEETINGROOM_INFO SET STATUS = 'D' , DEL_DATE = NOW() , DEL_ID = #del_id# WHERE MEETINGROOM_KEY = #meetingroom_key#
